title: Bound by Honor
overview: Based on the true life experiences of poet Jimmy Santiago Baca, the film focuses on step-brothers Paco and Cruz, and their bi-racial cousin Miklo.

title: Road to Perdition
overview: A mob enforcer's son witnesses a murder, forcing him and his father to take to the road, and his father down a path of redemption and revenge.

title: The Godfather
overview: An organized crime dynasty's aging patriarch transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: In the Heat of the Night
overview: A black police detective is asked to investigate a murder in a racially hostile southern town.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

title: Once Upon a Time in America
overview: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

title: Dancer in the Dark
overview: An East European girl travels to the United States with her young son, expecting it to be like a Hollywood film.

title: Boyz n the Hood
overview: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence, and future prospects.
stars: ['Cuba Gooding Jr.', 'Laurence Fishburne', 'Hudhail Al-Amir', 'Lloyd Avery II']

title: Inside Man
overview: A police detective, a bank robber, and a high-power broker enter high-stakes negotiations after the criminal's brilliant heist spirals into a hostage situation.

title: The Day of the Jackal
overview: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

title: A Clockwork Orange
overview: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

title: Out of the Past
overview: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses and duplicitous dames.

title: Taxi Driver
overview: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
overview: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

title: The Hateful Eight
overview: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: ['Samuel L. Jackson', 'Kurt Russell', 'Jennifer Jason Leigh', 'Walton Goggins']

title: The Green Mile
overview: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

title: Tengoku to jigoku
overview: An executive of a shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped and held for ransom.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
overview: Journalist Mikael Blomkvist is aided in his search for a woman who has been missing for forty years by Lisbeth Salander, a young computer hacker.

title: On the Waterfront
overview: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.

title: Touch of Evil
overview: A stark, perverse story of murder, kidnapping, and police corruption in a Mexican border town.
